trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for implementing a CodeDOM-based designer loader.
trans-unit.target: 提供基底類別實作 CodeDOM 設計工具載入器。

trans-unit.source: CodeDomDesignerLoader is an abstract class that provides a full designer loader based on the Code Document Object Model (CodeDOM).
trans-unit.target: CodeDomDesignerLoader 是提供根據程式碼文件物件模型 (CodeDOM) 的完整的設計工具載入器的抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: You provide the CodeDOM parser and generator, and a type resolution service.
trans-unit.target: 您提供 CodeDOM 剖析器和產生器和類型解析服務。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the CodeDomProvider this designer loader will use.
trans-unit.target: 取得此設計工具載入器將使用的 CodeDomProvider。

trans-unit.source: The designer loader does not parse or generate code from the returned CodeDomProvider, but it does use the provider to obtain an <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator> that it can use to validate identifiers in the name-creation service.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具載入器不會剖析或從傳回的 CodeDomProvider，產生程式碼，但它會使用提供者以取得<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator>它可用於驗證的名稱建立服務中的識別項。</xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator>

trans-unit.source: The designer loader will also check the CodeDomProvider to see if it implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ICodeDomDesignerReload> interface.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具載入器也會檢查以查看是否實作 CodeDomProvider<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ICodeDomDesignerReload>介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ICodeDomDesignerReload>

trans-unit.source: For more information on parsing or generating code, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.Parse%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.Write%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如需剖析或產生程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.Parse%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.Write%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.Write%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.Parse%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CodeDomProvider this designer loader will use
trans-unit.target: CodeDomProvider 此設計工具載入器將會使用

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源釋出<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method removes services added by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.Initialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法移除新增的服務<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.Initialize%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader>.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader>呼叫 Dispose

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法會使<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader>中無法使用的狀態。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 Dispose 之後，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader>所佔用。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 永遠呼叫 Dispose 之後，再放開您的最後一個參考至<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader>物件的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: Initializes services.
trans-unit.target: 初始化服務。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the replaceable services that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader> adds to the service container.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述可取代服務<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader>加入至服務容器。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: |Term|Definition| |----------|----------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.INameCreationService>|Provides semantics for creating names of objects.
trans-unit.target: |詞彙 |定義 | |----------|----------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.INameCreationService>|提供用於建立物件名稱的語意。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.INameCreationService>

trans-unit.source: The service uses the CodeDOM provider’s <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator> interface to create names that are valid identifiers for the language.
trans-unit.target: 服務會使用 CodeDOM 提供者的<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator>介面來建立有效的識別項的語言名稱。</xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the name creation service supports empty names.
trans-unit.target: 此外，名稱建立服務支援空的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Empty names should be interpreted as temporary local variables during serialization.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationService>|Allows other objects to serialize a group of components into a binary object.
trans-unit.target: 空白名稱應該在序列化期間解譯為暫時性的本機變數。 | |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationService>|可讓其他物件序列化為二進位物件的元件群組。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationService>

trans-unit.source: This service is most often used by features such as copy and paste or undo and redo.
trans-unit.target: 此服務最常用的功能，例如複製和貼上或復原和取消復原。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader> class provides a designer serialization service that is based on creating CodeDOM trees for objects.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ComponentSerializationService>|This service replaces <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationService> as a means to serialize components to a binary object.| For details on replaceable and non-replaceable services, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader>類別提供可根據建立物件的 CodeDOM 樹狀結構的設計工具的序列化服務。 | |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ComponentSerializationService>|此服務會取代<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationService>做為序列化的二進位物件的元件。 | 如需可取代和非可取代服務的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ComponentSerializationService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> has not been initialized, or the designer loader did not supply a type resolution service, which is required for CodeDom serialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"> </xref>尚未初始化，或設計工具載入器未提供類型解析服務，所需的 CodeDom 序列化。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a reload is required.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否需要重新載入。

trans-unit.source: The IsReloadNeeded method checks for the presence of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ICodeDomDesignerReload> interface on the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.CodeDomProvider%2A>.
trans-unit.target: IsReloadNeeded 方法會檢查<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ICodeDomDesignerReload><xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.CodeDomProvider%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.CodeDomProvider%2A>上的介面</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ICodeDomDesignerReload>的狀態

trans-unit.source: The provider will reparse the CodeDOM tree and pass the resulting parse tree to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ICodeDomDesignerReload.ShouldReloadDesigner%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 提供者將 CodeDOM 樹狀目錄中的重新分析，並傳遞至結果剖析樹狀目錄<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ICodeDomDesignerReload.ShouldReloadDesigner%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ICodeDomDesignerReload.ShouldReloadDesigner%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `false`, the designer will not be reloaded.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法傳回`false`，將不會重新載入設計工具。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.CodeDomProvider*> decides a reload is required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.CodeDomProvider*>決定重新載入必要項，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.CodeDomProvider*>

trans-unit.source: The language did not provide a code parser for this file; this file type may not support a designer.
trans-unit.target: 語言並未提供這個檔案中; 程式碼剖析器這種檔案類型可能不支援在設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The class can be designed, but it is not the first class in the file, or the designer could not be shown for this file because none of the classes within it can be designed.
trans-unit.target: 類別可以被設計，但它不是在檔案中，第一個類別或因為沒有類別可以設計，設計工具無法顯示此檔案。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer loader that loading is about to begin.
trans-unit.target: 通知設計工具載入器載入即將開始。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the OnBeginLoad method, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 OnBeginLoad 方法的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer loader that unloading is about to begin.
trans-unit.target: 通知設計工具載入器，卸載即將開始。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the OnBeginUnload method, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginUnload%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 OnBeginUnload 方法的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginUnload%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginUnload%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRename"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRename"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The component to rename.
trans-unit.target: 若要重新命名元件。

trans-unit.source: The original name of the component.
trans-unit.target: 原始元件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The new name of the component.
trans-unit.target: 元件的新名稱。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer loader that loading is complete.
trans-unit.target: 通知設計工具載入器載入已完成。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the OnEndLoad method, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 OnEndLoad 方法的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the load completed successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示已成功; 完成負載否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of objects (usually exceptions) that were reported as errors.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>的物件 （通常是例外狀況） 回報為錯誤。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Parses the text or other persistent storage and returns a <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 剖析的文字或其他永續性儲存體，並傳回<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Parse method is called when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader> needs to parse the source code.
trans-unit.target: Parse 方法時，會呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader>需要剖析原始程式碼。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: The source code location and format must be specified by deriving classes.
trans-unit.target: 必須指定來源位置和格式，藉由衍生類別。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> resulting from a parse operation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"> </xref>所產生的剖析作業。

trans-unit.source: Requests serialization of the root component of the designer.
trans-unit.target: 要求序列化設計工具的根元件。

trans-unit.source: The PerformFlush method obtains the root <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer> for the root component of the designer and invokes the serializer to serialize the component.
trans-unit.target: PerformFlush 方法取得根<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer>根元件的設計工具，並叫用序列化程式序列化的元件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer>

trans-unit.source: If the result of this operation is a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration>, then PerformFlush integrates the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration> with the existing CodeDOM tree.
trans-unit.target: 如果這項作業的結果是<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration>，然後 PerformFlush 整合<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration>使用現有的 CodeDOM 樹狀目錄。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration> </xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration>

trans-unit.source: The result is the original CodeDOM tree with matching members and statements replaced.
trans-unit.target: 結果會以相符的成員和陳述式取代原始的 CodeDOM 樹狀目錄。

trans-unit.source: Finally, PerformFlush calls the abstract <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.Write%2A> method to save this CodeDOM tree.
trans-unit.target: 最後，PerformFlush 呼叫抽象<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.Write%2A>方法來儲存此 CodeDOM 樹狀目錄。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the serialization of the root designer component does not result in a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration>, then PerformFlush does nothing further.
trans-unit.target: 如果序列化的根設計工具元件不會導致<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration>，則 PerformFlush 不會進一步動作。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > It is the responsibility of the caller to ensure that a CodeDOM originates from a trusted source.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 是呼叫者，以確保 CodeDOM 是來自受信任來源的責任。

trans-unit.source: Accepting a CodeDOM object from an untrusted party could allow that party to run malicious code.
trans-unit.target: 接受來自不受信任的合作對象為 CodeDOM 物件可能會允許該合作對象，執行惡意程式碼。

trans-unit.source: When flushing a CodeDOM into a file, the framework will run code represented by the CodeDOM object and the serialized content of the object as provided.
trans-unit.target: 當排清至檔案的 CodeDOM，架構就會執行 CodeDOM 物件序列化的物件所提供的內容所表示的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> from which to request the serializer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref>從中要求序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: The language did not provide a code parser for this file; this file type may not support a designer.
trans-unit.target: 語言並未提供這個檔案中; 程式碼剖析器這種檔案類型可能不支援在設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The class can be designed, but it is not the first class in the file, or the designer could not be shown for this file because none of the classes within it can be designed.
trans-unit.target: 類別可以被設計，但它不是在檔案中，第一個類別或因為沒有類別可以設計，設計工具無法顯示此檔案。

trans-unit.source: Parses code from a CodeDOM provider.
trans-unit.target: 剖析從 CodeDOM 提供者的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The PerformLoad method obtains an <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeParser> from the CodeDOM provider and parses the code.
trans-unit.target: PerformLoad 方法會取得<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeParser>CodeDOM 提供者和剖析程式碼。</xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeParser>

trans-unit.source: PerformLoad locates the first class in the file, obtains a root <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer> for the data type, and then invokes the serializer to deserialize the data type.
trans-unit.target: PerformLoad 檔案中尋找第一個類別，取得根<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer>資料類型，然後再叫用要還原序列化的資料類型的序列化程式。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer>

trans-unit.source: PerformLoad assumes that this process will create all necessary components in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: PerformLoad 假設此程序會建立所有必要的元件中<xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>

trans-unit.source: Finally, PerformLoad calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.SetBaseComponentClassName%2A> method with the fully qualified name of the type it passed to the CodeDOM serializer.
trans-unit.target: 最後，會呼叫 PerformLoad<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.SetBaseComponentClassName%2A>方法具有它傳遞給 CodeDOM 序列化程式的類型完整名稱。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.SetBaseComponentClassName%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > It is the responsibility of the caller to ensure that a CodeDOM originates from a trusted source.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 是呼叫者，以確保 CodeDOM 是來自受信任來源的責任。

trans-unit.source: Accepting a CodeDOM object from an untrusted party could allow that party to run malicious code.
trans-unit.target: 接受來自不受信任的合作對象為 CodeDOM 物件可能會允許該合作對象，執行惡意程式碼。

trans-unit.source: When loading a CodeDOM into the design surface, the framework will run code represented by the CodeDOM object and the serialized content of the object as provided.
trans-unit.target: 當 CodeDOM 載入設計介面時，framework 就會執行 CodeDOM 物件序列化的物件所提供的內容所表示的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> from which to request the serializer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref>從中要求序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: The language did not provide a code parser for this file; this file type may not support a designer.
trans-unit.target: 語言並未提供這個檔案中; 程式碼剖析器這種檔案類型可能不支援在設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The class can be designed, but it is not the first class in the file, or the designer could not be shown for this file because none of the classes within it can be designed.
trans-unit.target: 類別可以被設計，但它不是在檔案中，第一個類別或因為沒有類別可以設計，設計工具無法顯示此檔案。

trans-unit.source: Deserializes the specified serialization data object and returns a collection of objects represented by that data.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的序列化資料物件並傳回該資料所代表的物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: An object consisting of serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 資料序列化物件所組成。

trans-unit.source: A collection of objects represented by serializationData.
trans-unit.target: 所表示之物件的集合 serializationData 。

trans-unit.source: serializationData is not a .
trans-unit.target: serializationDatais not a .

trans-unit.source: Serializes the specified collection of objects and stores them in a serialization data object.
trans-unit.target: 序列化指定的物件集合，並將它們儲存在序列化資料物件。

trans-unit.source: A collection of objects to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的物件集合。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the serialized state of the specified collection of objects.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含序列化的狀態的指定物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ComponentSerializationService"></xref> was not found.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ComponentSerializationService"> </xref>找不到。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new name that is unique to all components in the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定的容器中的所有元件的都唯一新名稱。

trans-unit.source: The container where the new object is added.
trans-unit.target: 其中會加入新的物件容器。

trans-unit.source: The data type of the object that receives the name.
trans-unit.target: 接收名稱的物件資料類型。

trans-unit.source: A unique name for the data type.
trans-unit.target: 資料類型的唯一名稱。

trans-unit.source: dataType is .
trans-unit.target: dataTypeis .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified name is valid.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出指定的名稱是否有效。

trans-unit.source: The name to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the name is valid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果名稱有效，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: name is .
trans-unit.target: nameis .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified name is valid.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出指定的名稱是否有效。

trans-unit.source: The name to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的名稱。

trans-unit.source: name is .
trans-unit.target: nameis .

trans-unit.source: name is not a valid identifier, or there is already a component with the same name.
trans-unit.target: name不是有效的識別項，或已經有具有相同名稱的元件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type resolution service to be used with this designer loader.
trans-unit.target: 取得要搭配此設計工具載入器的類型解析服務。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader> automatically adds this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> to the service container when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.Initialize%2A> method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader>自動將其新增<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService>至服務容器時<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.Initialize%2A>叫用方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.Initialize%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: While the type resolution service is optional in many scenarios, it is required for code interpretation because source code contains type names, but no assembly references.
trans-unit.target: 在許多案例中的選擇性類型解析服務時，它是所需程式碼解譯因為原始程式碼包含類型名稱，而非組件參考。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService"></xref> that the CodeDOM serializers will use when resolving types.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService"> </xref> CodeDOM 序列化程式將使用解析型別時使用。

trans-unit.source: Writes compile-unit changes to persistent storage.
trans-unit.target: 將編譯單位的變更寫入至永續性儲存體。

trans-unit.source: The Write method saves a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit> to persistent storage.
trans-unit.target: Write 方法儲存<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit>永續性儲存體。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit>

trans-unit.source: The deriving class is responsible for invoking the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator> on the appropriate text writer to save the code.
trans-unit.target: 衍生的類別會負責叫用<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator>上適當的文字寫入器來儲存程式碼。</xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader> ensures that the CodeDOM objects that are passed to Write are the same instances of objects that were retrieved from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.Parse%2A>, except in cases where the serialization process had to make changes to the code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader>可確保，CodeDOM 物件傳遞給寫入都是相同的執行個體的物件擷取自<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.Parse%2A>，除非在序列化程序，必須變更程式碼的情況下。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader.Parse%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: This allows an optimized designer loader to store additional data in the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeObject.UserData%2A> property of code elements.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓其他資料儲存在最佳化的設計工具載入器<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeObject.UserData%2A>屬性的程式碼項目。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeObject.UserData%2A>

trans-unit.source: This data will be available during the Write method for any elements that were not replaced by the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: Write 方法的序列化處理序未取代任何項目期間將使用此資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> to be persisted.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"> </xref>保存。
